summary: Phase 2 Production Hardening near completion: ✅ T5 Stream Chat validated locally, ✅ T6 Enterprise security system complete, ✅ T7 Database backup & DR procedures implemented. Now executing T8 Production Environment Configuration Audit - comprehensive review of all environment variables, third-party API integrations, and environment segregation for production readiness.
current_status: Phase 2: 75% complete (3/4 tasks done). Database validated with 67 tables, security systems enterprise-ready with comprehensive rate limiting, CSRF protection, input validation. Disaster recovery procedures documented with RTO <1hr, RPO <4hrs. Next: complete production environment audit and transition to Phase 3 validation testing.
